# Shadow Whispers (Trait)
## Overview
**Shadow Whispers (Norgorber):** You have a penchant for just knowing others' secrets. You gain a +1 trait bonus on [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (local) checks and a +2 trait bonus on [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] checks made to demoralize opponents.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 64
